snippet: The Jets picked linebacker Demario Davis in the N.F.L. draft for his speed, his special-teams skills, his experience covering tight ends and his ability to lead through actions.
abstract: Profile of New York Jets rookie linebacker Demario Davis, third-round pick who was chosen for his speed, his special-teams skills, his experience covering tight ends and his ability to lead through actions.
lead_paragraph: The Jets picked linebacker Demario Davis in the N.F.L. draft for his speed, his special-teams skills, his experience covering tight ends and his ability to lead through actions.

headline.seo: Jets Draft Pick Demario Davis Has Always Been a Step Ahead
